name: Fish n Chips
description:
On this game you control a school of fish, with the goal of making all the fishes join you, while avoiding the giant shark.

Controls: 

  • mouse to control the camera
  • W/S to move forwards or backwards
  • A/D to move rightwards or leftwards
  • Q/E or Mayus/Control to move upwards or downwards

This is our entry for the GameMakers Toolkit gamejam 2021 "JOIN TOGETHER".

Team Coconauts
